name: BOSQUET POLYNICE
description: Advocacy for improving the Political, Economic, and Social situation in Haiti.
sampleDescriptions: Introduce Bosquet Polynice and his positions concerning the Political, Economic, and Social situation in Haiti to members of the Congress and their staffers.
Present the current situation in Haiti. Present Mr. Bosquet Polynice as viable leader in Haiti.
Improve the Political and Human Rights situation in Haiti.
Improve the Political and Human Rights situation in Haiti.
